item.title: good to great
item.author: Michael the gutschy Holz
item.description: I read Good to Great in January 2016. An awesome read sharing detailed analysis on how good companies became great. Although this book is about how companies became great but we coult apply a lot of the learning on ours elves. Concept like level 5 leader, hedgehog concept, the stockdale paradox are equally applicable to individuals.
